item.title: Chaos & Nonlinear Dynamics Explorer
item.description: Interactive visualizations of chaos theory and nonlinear dynamics, featuring double pendulum, Lorenz attractor, bifurcation diagrams, and Hopf bifurcation research

item.title: Connect 4 Multiplayer Game
item.description: A customizable Connect 4 game supporting 2-4 players with variable board sizes

item.title: Quantum Mechanics Visualizer
item.description: Interactive visualizations of fundamental quantum mechanical systems
